Detailed Description

This is a class that stores the font data.

This class is used to set up a Font Texture for use with Sonetto::SonettoTextElement.

void Sonetto::Font::setUpFont ( unsigned long  x,
unsigned long  y,
float  default_space,
const Ogre::String &  name 
)

Set up the font.

This function initialise the font.

Parameters:
x is the number of horizontal glyphs in the texture.
y is the number of vertical glyphs in the texture.
default_space is the default vertical space between the letters.
name is the texture name for this font.

glyph is the Glyph ID.
spcWidth is the horizontal space for this glyph.
